title: Tarah Woodblade
description: A Bowl of Souls Novel  The war is over, but there is a void of power that must be filled and no shortage of souls eager to fill it.  Tarah Woodblade was the best guide and tracker in the land, but she ran away from the war. She returns to Dremaldria expecting to be labeled a coward, but finds herself lauded as a hero. It seems a hero is needed too, because someone is hunting rogue horses . . .
author: Trevor H. Cooley
